snippet: Mr. Faber, a Nazi collaborator, was convicted of taking part in killings at three Dutch locations. He escaped prison and lived in Germany for nearly 60 years.
abstract: Klaas Faber, Nazi collaborator and war criminal who escaped to Germany in 1952, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Faber, a Nazi collaborator, was convicted of taking part in killings at three Dutch locations. He escaped prison and lived in Germany for nearly 60 years.

headline.seo: Klaas Faber, War Criminal From the Netherlands, Dies at 90
headline.main: Klaas Faber, War Criminal Who Escaped Punishment, Is Dead at 90
headline.print_headline: Klaas Faber, 90, a War Criminal Who Escaped to Germany

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
